title: Githyanki Greatsword
content:
Conditional)

Githborn Psionic Weapon: When wielded by a githyanki this weapon deals an additional 1~4 Psychic damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Though heavily decorated and inlaid with rubies, the blade's sharp edge suggests its use isn't merely ornamental.

Greatsword Two-Handed

Githyanki Greatsword is one of the Martial Two-Handed Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse,
